property_registration.1: Registration Act - All property transactions above Rs.100 must be registered
property_registration.2: Registration within 4 months of execution of document
property_registration.3: Stamp duty payment mandatory - varies by state (5-10% of property value)
property_registration.4: Unregistered documents not admissible as evidence in court

property_transfer.10: Transfer of Property Act - Sale deed must be in writing and registered
property_transfer.11: Seller must have clear title to transfer property
property_transfer.12: Buyer entitled to possession after full payment
property_transfer.13: Gift deed for property transfer without consideration
property_transfer.14: Will for testamentary transfer of property

tenant_rights.20: Rent Control Act - Protection against arbitrary eviction
tenant_rights.21: Rent increase limited to prescribed percentage
tenant_rights.22: Tenant cannot be evicted without court order
tenant_rights.23: Grounds for eviction - Non-payment of rent, subletting, property damage
tenant_rights.24: Notice period - 15 days for monthly tenancy, 6 months for yearly

landlord_rights.30: Right to receive rent on agreed date
landlord_rights.31: Right to evict for non-payment after 15 days notice
landlord_rights.32: Right to inspect property with prior notice
landlord_rights.33: Right to increase rent as per agreement or law
landlord_rights.34: Right to claim damages for property damage by tenant

property_disputes.40: Partition suit for division of joint property
property_disputes.41: Specific performance suit to enforce sale agreement
property_disputes.42: Declaration suit to establish ownership rights
property_disputes.43: Injunction to prevent illegal construction or encroachment
property_disputes.44: Adverse possession - 12 years continuous possession gives ownership rights

rera_provisions.50: RERA - Real Estate Regulatory Authority for buyer protection
rera_provisions.51: Builder must register project with RERA before advertising
rera_provisions.52: 70% of buyer payments must be kept in escrow account
rera_provisions.53: Delay in possession - Buyer entitled to refund with interest
rera_provisions.54: Defects in construction - Builder liable for 5 years
rera_provisions.55: Carpet area must be as per RERA definition
rera_provisions.56: Complaint to RERA within 3 years of cause of action

mortgage.60: Simple mortgage - Debt secured by property without possession transfer
mortgage.61: Mortgage by conditional sale - Sale becomes absolute on default
mortgage.62: Usufructuary mortgage - Creditor gets possession and rents
mortgage.63: English mortgage - Property transferred with condition of re-transfer on payment
mortgage.64: Foreclosure - Creditor can sell property on default after court decree

easement_rights.70: Right of way - Access through another's property
easement_rights.71: Right to light and air - Cannot be obstructed by neighbor
easement_rights.72: Right to water - Access to water source
easement_rights.73: Easement by prescription - 20 years continuous use creates right
